Labels: frontend, task
Milestone: M5

Descrizione

Generare l'app Angular in `src/Web/ClientApp` con Angular CLI, includere routing, scss, e installare Angular Material. Aggiungere skeleton components per timesheets, projects e admin.

Deliverables

- Angular project in `src/Web/ClientApp`
- Angular Material installato e tema base
- Placeholder components e routes
